info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 2:55PM EST until further notice by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River at Stevenson Dam. * WHEN...From late tonight until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, moderate flood stage with numerous homes in the Maples area of Shelton affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 8.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue rising to a crest of 15.3 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Stevenson Dam Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Tue 2 pm: 8.7 Forecast: Tue 7 pm 7.9 Wed 1 am 10.5 Wed 7 am 14.5 Wed 1 pm 15.3 Wed 7 pm 15.3 Thu 1 am 14.3 Thu 7 am 14.3 Thu 1 pm 14.0 Thu 7 pm 12.4 Fri 1 am 12.4 Fri 7 am 12.4 &&
